Quote.Author: Bill Bryson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a great believer that you had to do everything you've done to have got to where you are

Quote.Author: Bill Dedman
Quote.QuoteValue: With better gear, firefighters no longer surround and drown a fire - they go in

Quote.Author: Bill Engvall
Quote.QuoteValue: It's funny: people who meet me say, 'I thought you'd be different.' But I'm still the same guy

Quote.Author: Bill Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the comments about me being a shill for leadership are beyond the pale

Quote.Author: Bill Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I really don't have a favorite team

Quote.Author: Bill Hader
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in a total Pink Floyd house

Quote.Author: Bill Hicks
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't mean to sound bitter, cold, or cruel, but I am, so that's how it comes out

Quote.Author: Bill James
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always been much better at asking questions than knowing what the answers were

Quote.Author: Bill Maher
Quote.QuoteValue: Suicide is man's way of telling God, 'You can't fire me - I quit.'

Quote.Author: Bill Murray
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be that guy mumbling into his drink at a bar

Quote.Author: Bill Nye
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you find out about the world, the more opportunities there are to laugh at it

Quote.Author: Bill Owens
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom is contagious. That's why despots fear it so much

Quote.Author: Bill Parcells
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't get any medal for trying something, you get medals for results

Quote.Author: Bill Watterson
Quote.QuoteValue: Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend

Quote.Author: Billie Holiday
Quote.QuoteValue: A kiss that is never tasted, is forever and ever wasted

Quote.Author: Billie Jean King
Quote.QuoteValue: A champion is afraid of losing. Everyone else is afraid of winning

Quote.Author: Billie Joe Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing wrong with being a loser, it just depends on how good you are at it

Quote.Author: Billy Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: Did your mother never tell you not to drink on an empty head?

Quote.Author: Billy Corgan
Quote.QuoteValue: Most people don't know that wrestling came out of the circus

Quote.Author: Billy Crystal
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm going to go on just living and laughing and loving

Quote.Author: Billy Joel
Quote.QuoteValue: I definitely prefer being a lover than a fighter

Quote.Author: Billy Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: I love beautiful wood

Quote.Author: Billy Sunday
Quote.QuoteValue: Hell is the highest reward that the devil can offer you for being a servant of his

Quote.Author: Billy Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to have a dream so you can get up in the morning

Quote.Author: Bindi Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: As I'm getting older, I'm really learning unconditional love and loyalty are extremely important

Quote.Author: Bjork
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd done three solo albums in a row, and that's quite narcissistic

Quote.Author: Blake Farenthold
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody in the Washington regulatory bureaucracy gets fired for saying no

Quote.Author: Blake Lively
Quote.QuoteValue: The most beautiful thing you can wear is confidence

Quote.Author: Blake Shelton
Quote.QuoteValue: I like bubble baths

Quote.Author: Bo Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: A dream becomes a goal when action is taken toward its achievement

Quote.Author: Bo Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there

Quote.Author: Bob Hope
Quote.QuoteValue: You know you're getting old when the candles cost more than the cake

Quote.Author: Bob Iger
Quote.QuoteValue: The heart and soul of the company is creativity and innovation

Quote.Author: Bob Newhart
Quote.QuoteValue: This stammer got me a home in Beverly Hills, and I'm not about to screw with it now

Quote.Author: Bob Uecker
Quote.QuoteValue: I had slumps that lasted into the winter

Quote.Author: Bobby Fischer
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the moment when I break a man's ego

Quote.Author: Bobby Flay
Quote.QuoteValue: A grill is just a source of heat. Just like a stove, it is very user-friendly

Quote.Author: Bobby Heenan
Quote.QuoteValue: The money's the same, whether you earn it or scam it

Quote.Author: Bobby Knight
Quote.QuoteValue: The will to succeed is important, but what's more important is the will to prepare

Quote.Author: Bobby McFerrin
Quote.QuoteValue: The true musician is to bring light into people's hearts

Quote.Author: Bobby Orr
Quote.QuoteValue: I never looked at hockey as work. Now that I'd finished playing, I had to go to work

Quote.Author: Bobby Seale
Quote.QuoteValue: Lots of people think I went to prison. I never went to prison. I was in jail without bail

Quote.Author: Bodhidharma
Quote.QuoteValue: Regardless of what we do, our karma has no hold on us

Quote.Author: Bonnie Raitt
Quote.QuoteValue: Solar power is the last energy resource that isn't owned yet - nobody taxes the sun yet

Quote.Author: Bonnie Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: I still love to do the old songs. I know some people don't

Quote.Author: Bono
Quote.QuoteValue: Music can change the world because it can change people

Quote.Author: Booker T. Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing ever comes to one, that is worth having, except as a result of hard work

Quote.Author: Boris Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: My policy on cake is pro having it and pro eating it

Quote.Author: Brad Feld
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't be afraid to have a big vision, but make sure it's a clear one

Quote.Author: Brad Goreski
Quote.QuoteValue: My sister has been there for me through everything

Quote.Author: Brad Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning

Quote.Author: Brad Paisley
Quote.QuoteValue: That there's no more important decision in life than who you marry

Quote.Author: Brad Pitt
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a lovely experience walking around a museum by yourself

Quote.Author: Bradley Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: If you look at anything, there are always comedic moments

Quote.Author: Bradley Whitford
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to see Bob Dylan do sketch comedy. I'm a huge Bob Dylan fan

Quote.Author: Bradley Wiggins
Quote.QuoteValue: My attitude is that, if you have nothing to hide, why not show it?

Quote.Author: Branch Rickey
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not the honor that you take with you, but the heritage you leave behind

Quote.Author: Brantley Gilbert
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't write anything that I hadn't experienced or hadn't been through

Quote.Author: Brendan Behan
Quote.QuoteValue: Every man, through fear, mugs his aspirations a dozen times a day

Quote.Author: Brendon Urie
Quote.QuoteValue: It's cool to be different and just be who you are and shock people in a good way

Quote.Author: Brett Favre
Quote.QuoteValue: I think every player should think that he's a difference maker

Quote.Author: Brett Young
Quote.QuoteValue: It's really hard to chase a lofty dream

Quote.Author: Brian Celio
Quote.QuoteValue: I write my own quotes. Except this one. I obviously stole this from somebody really clever

Quote.Author: Brian Eno
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not the destination that matters. It's the change of scene

Quote.Author: Brian Greene
Quote.QuoteValue: The bottom line is that time travel is allowed by the laws of physics

Quote.Author: Brian May
Quote.QuoteValue: The guitar has a kind of grit and excitement possessed by nothing else

Quote.Author: Brian Molko
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a weirdo magnet, but I'm handling it better than I used to

Quote.Author: Brian O'Driscoll
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowledge is knowing that a tomato is a fruit. Wisdom is knowing not to put it in a fruit salad

Quote.Author: Brian Tracy
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance

Quote.Author: Brian Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: What in the world is a hangover cure?

Quote.Author: Brie Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: For some reason, chewing gum for me gets my brain going

Quote.Author: Brigham Young
Quote.QuoteValue: True independence and freedom can only exist in doing what's right

Quote.Author: Brigitte Bardot
Quote.QuoteValue: It is better to be unfaithful than to be faithful without wanting to be

Quote.Author: Britney Spears
Quote.QuoteValue: I dress the way I want. I don't pretend to be someone I'm not

Quote.Author: Brittany Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: You actually can make it, no matter what. I truly am a firm believer in that. Eminem's living proof

Quote.Author: Brock Osweiler
Quote.QuoteValue: When there's pressure, I believe people will break under it or a diamond will be created

Quote.Author: Bruce Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything you need to know about Iron Maiden is onstage

Quote.Author: Bruce Springsteen
Quote.QuoteValue: I have spent my life judging the distance between American reality and the American dream

Quote.Author: Bruce Willis
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't undo the past... but you can certainly not repeat it

Quote.Author: Bruno Mars
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned people are watching, so don't do nothing stupid

Quote.Author: Bryan Ferry
Quote.QuoteValue: You can never get silence anywhere nowadays, have you noticed?

Quote.Author: Bryant H. McGill
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no love without forgiveness, and there is no forgiveness without love

Quote.Author: Bryce Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't have dreams, you don't have a life

Quote.Author: Bubba Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: My dad's not here, but he's watching in heaven

Quote.Author: Buffalo Bill
Quote.QuoteValue: But the love of adventure was in father's blood

Quote.Author: Burnie Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: If somebody's in the community doing cool stuff, we'll hire them

Quote.Author: Buzz Aldrin
Quote.QuoteValue: If we can conquer space, we can conquer childhood hunger

Quote.Author: Caitlin Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate that tabloid idea of anybody who is famous having to forfeit their privacy

Quote.Author: Caitlyn Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: Sexuality is who you are personally attracted to... But gender identity is who you are in your soul

Quote.Author: Cal Ripken, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: You could be a kid for as long as you want when you play baseball

Quote.Author: Calvin Klein
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been strong and determined all my life about many things I've wanted

Quote.Author: Camille Paglia
Quote.QuoteValue: Manhood coerced into sensitivity is no manhood at all

Quote.Author: Candice Swanepoel
Quote.QuoteValue: I like a man who looks like a bad boy but knows how to treat a woman like a queen

Quote.Author: Captain Beefheart
Quote.QuoteValue: When I see a dolphin, I know it's just as smart as I am

Quote.Author: Cara Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: This modeling thing, it's pretty easy, but actually it's also really tough

Quote.Author: Carice van Houten
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's cool people love to hate me

Quote.Author: Carine Roitfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: When I don't know what to wear, I wear black lace

Quote.Author: Carl Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is about timing

Quote.Author: Carl Sandburg
Quote.QuoteValue: A baby is God's opinion that life should go on

Quote.Author: Carl von Clausewitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Pursue one great decisive aim with force and determination

Quote.Author: Carlene Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: Musically, I always wanted to experiment

Quote.Author: Carlos Ghosn
Quote.QuoteValue: The time is right for electric cars - in fact the time is critical

Quote.Author: Carlos Santana
Quote.QuoteValue: There's never one sunrise the same or one sunset the same

Quote.Author: Carlos Slim
Quote.QuoteValue: You should have more time for you during all of your life - not when you're 65 and retired

Quote.Author: Carly Fiorina
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is measured in love and positive contributions and moments of grace

Quote.Author: Carly Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: A really strong woman accepts the war she went through and is ennobled by her scars

Quote.Author: Carmelo Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a risk

Quote.Author: Carol Leifer
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not into working out. My philosophy: No pain, no pain

Quote.Author: Carole King
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents always told me I could be anything I wanted to be

Quote.Author: Carolina Herrera
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion has always been a repetition of ideas, but what makes it new is the way you put it together

Quote.Author: Caroline Wozniacki
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't dwell in your past but move forward, look forward. That's it

Quote.Author: Carrie Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Instant gratification takes too long

Quote.Author: Carrie Underwood
Quote.QuoteValue: Every day is a new day, and you'll never be able to find happiness if you don't move on

Quote.Author: Carroll Shelby
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been asked, 'What is my favorite car?' and I've always said 'The next one.'

Quote.Author: Carson Wentz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very motivated person. I don't need extra motivation

Quote.Author: Carter G. Woodson
Quote.QuoteValue: When you control a man's thinking you do not have to worry about his actions

Quote.Author: Cary Fukunaga
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the semantics of mini-series for a network is that it has an end

Quote.Author: Casey Kasem
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep your feet on the ground and keep reaching for the stars

Quote.Author: Casey Neistat
Quote.QuoteValue: I always thought of myself as an amateur stunt man

Quote.Author: Casey Stengel
Quote.QuoteValue: Finding good players is easy. Getting them to play as a team is another story

Quote.Author: Casey Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're on a road trip, anything goes

Quote.Author: Cass Sunstein
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that every state in the union should recognize same-sex marriage

Quote.Author: Cat Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything I do is for the pleasure of Allah

Quote.Author: Cate Blanchett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so misunderstood!

Quote.Author: Catherine the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: I praise loudly. I blame softly

Quote.Author: Catherine Zet
Quote.QuoteValue: ones - I get a bit gloomy when it's gloomy

Quote.Author: Cathy Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: You got to try and reach for the stars or try and achieve the unreachable

Quote.Author: CeeLo Green
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to write a song about reality because reality doesn't rhyme

Quote.Author: Celine Dion
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know if the camera likes me, but I do like the camera

Quote.Author: Cesar Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: The fight is never about grapes or lettuce. It is always about people

Quote.Author: Cesar Millan
Quote.QuoteValue: Just being with dogs, I learned their ways and began to appreciate things from their point of view

Quote.Author: Cesare Pavese
Quote.QuoteValue: We do not remember days, we remember moments

Quote.Author: Channing Tatum
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is too short to miss out on the beautiful things like a double cheeseburger

Quote.Author: Charlaine Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: If I quit having fun, then it's time for me to quit working

Quote.Author: Charles B. Rangel
Quote.QuoteValue: A quality education grants us the ability to fight the war on ignorance and poverty

Quote.Author: Charles Barkley
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes that light at the end of the tunnel is a train

Quote.Author: Charles Baudelaire
Quote.QuoteValue: The world only goes round by misunderstanding

Quote.Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people never go crazy, What truly horrible lives they must live

Quote.Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote.QuoteValue: True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it is lost

Quote.Author: Charles Darwin
Quote.QuoteValue: A man's friendships are one of the best measures of his worth

Quote.Author: Charles de Gaulle
Quote.QuoteValue: Greatness is a road leading towards the unknown

Quote.Author: Charles de Montesquieu
Quote.QuoteValue: The less men think, the more they talk

Quote.Author: Charles Duhigg
Quote.QuoteValue: Habits are malleable throughout your entire life

Quote.Author: Charles Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Westminster is a jungle - and the hunter can always smell fear on its prey

Quote.Author: Charles Kettering
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't have a better tomorrow if you are thinking about yesterday all the time

Quote.Author: Charles Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: He was one of those men who possess almost every gift, except the gift of the power to use them

Quote.Author: Charles Kuralt
Quote.QuoteValue: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege

Quote.Author: Charles Lamb
Quote.QuoteValue: My motto is: Contented with little, yet wishing for more

Quote.Author: Charles Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: If I had to choose, I would rather have birds than airplanes

Quote.Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote.QuoteValue: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt

Quote.Author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand
Quote.QuoteValue: Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love

Quote.Author: Charles Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: On Sunday morning, I'm not nervous... I can't wait to tell what God wants me to say

Quote.Author: Charli XCX
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not good at dressing up fancy; I always just do my thing, which is whatever I'm in the mood for

Quote.Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote.QuoteValue: A day without laughter is a day wasted

Quote.Author: Charlie Puth
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't start singing until I was 16. I was afraid to sing in front of people

Quote.Author: Charlie Sheen
Quote.QuoteValue: Boom, crush. Night, losers. Winning, duh

Quote.Author: Charlize Theron
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I don't think any mother aims to be a single mom. I didn't wish for that, but it happened

Quote.Author: Charlotte Bronte
Quote.QuoteValue: I am no bird; and no net ensnares me; I am a free human being with an independent will

Quote.Author: Charlotte Dujardin
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to get up and ride my horses, do what I love doing. I don't want to be recognised

Quote.Author: Che Guevara
Quote.QuoteValue: The revolution is not an apple that falls when it is ripe. You have to make it fall

Quote.Author: Cheech Marin
Quote.QuoteValue: The reason we're so dangerous is because we're totally harmless

Quote.Author: Chelsea Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: Determination gets you a long way

Quote.Author: Chelsea Handler
Quote.QuoteValue: The love that comes from friendship is the underlying facet of a happy life

Quote.Author: Cher
Quote.QuoteValue: If you really want something you can figure out how to make it happen

Quote.Author: Chevy Chase
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess I look so straight and normal, nobody expects me to pick my nose and fall

Quote.Author: Chiara Ferragni
Quote.QuoteValue: This mix of willingness and passion made me the businesswoman I am now

Quote.Author: Chief Joseph
Quote.QuoteValue: It makes my heart sick when I remember all the good words and the broken promises

Quote.Author: Chris Cornell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not usually in a talkative mode

Quote.Author: Chris Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: I am single and not looking to be in a relationship

Quote.Author: Chris Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, life is about experience and being a good person

Quote.Author: Chris Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: My real big Internet claim to fame is the fact that I was first to jailbreak the iPhone

Quote.Author: Chris Jericho
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a kid, I wanted to be either a rock star or a wrestler

Quote.Author: Chris Kyle
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to slow your heart rate, stay calm. You have to shoot in between your heartbeats

Quote.Author: Chris Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: Music comes from a place we don't know

Quote.Author: Chris Pine
Quote.QuoteValue: The authentic experience, where is that? Living the moment. That is something that we're losing

Quote.Author: Chris Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: Just be comfortable with who you are

Quote.Author: Chris Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: There are only three things women need in life: food, water, and compliments

Quote.Author: Chris Stapleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a hustler. I don't pitch songs. I don't ask people to write with me. It's not what I do

Quote.Author: Chrissy Metz
Quote.QuoteValue: So much of the mainstream media has taught us what beauty is, but everyone is beautiful

Quote.Author: Christian Bale
Quote.QuoteValue: I think trying too hard to be sexy is the worst thing in the world a woman can do

Quote.Author: Christian Dior
Quote.QuoteValue: After women, flowers are the most lovely thing God has given the world

Quote.Author: Christian Louboutin
Quote.QuoteValue: If you do what you love, it is the best way to relax

Quote.Author: Christian Slater
Quote.QuoteValue: I've calmed down, certainly, from the days of being 18, but I'm still having a good time

Quote.Author: Christie Brinkley
Quote.QuoteValue: Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace

Quote.Author: Christina Aguilera
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a bit of a night owl because that's when I feel the most creative and alive

Quote.Author: Christina Milian
Quote.QuoteValue: I am also a hard worker and people are sometimes surprised to see that as well

Quote.Author: Christina Ricci
Quote.QuoteValue: I knew I would never be cast as the pretty girl

Quote.Author: Christine Quinn
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be a better Chris Quinn. I don't want to be a different Chris Quinn

Quote.Author: Christopher Lasch
Quote.QuoteValue: The effect of the mass media is not to elicit belief but to maintain the apparatus of addiction

Quote.Author: Christopher Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I associate heavy metal with fantasy because of the tremendous power that the music delivers

Quote.Author: Christopher Marlowe
Quote.QuoteValue: O, thou art fairer than the evening air clad in the beauty of a thousand stars

Quote.Author: Christopher Morley
Quote.QuoteValue: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water

Quote.Author: Christopher Nolan
Quote.QuoteValue: I just love photographing things and putting them together to tell a story

Quote.Author: Christopher Reeve
Quote.QuoteValue: Either you decide to stay in the shallow end of the pool or you go out in the ocean

Quote.Author: Christopher Walken
Quote.QuoteValue: At its best, life is completely unpredictable

Quote.Author: Christy Turlington
Quote.QuoteValue: My day-to-day life changes; I don't have any standard day

Quote.Author: Chuck Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: It's amazing how much you can learn if your intentions are truly earnest

Quote.Author: Chuck Close
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't work with inspiration. Inspiration is for amateurs. I just get to work

Quote.Author: Chuck Fleischmann
Quote.QuoteValue: I fervently believe that education is the key to moving forward

Quote.Author: Chuck Noll
Quote.QuoteValue: Good things happen to those who hustle

Quote.Author: Chuck Norris
Quote.QuoteValue: Men are like steel. When they lose their temper, they lose their worth

Quote.Author: Chuck Palahniuk
Quote.QuoteValue: The lower you fall, the higher you'll fly

Quote.Author: Chuck Schumer
Quote.QuoteValue: I think teaching should be an exalted profession, not a picked-on profession

Quote.Author: Ciara
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't embrace who you are and accept who you are, you won't be able to live a happy life

Quote.Author: Cilla Black
Quote.QuoteValue: I intend to grow old very disgracefully

Quote.Author: Claire Danes
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting is the greatest answer to my loneliness that I have found

Quote.Author: Clare Boothe Luce
Quote.QuoteValue: Money can't buy happiness, but it can make you awfully comfortable while you're being miserable

Quote.Author: Clarence Darrow
Quote.QuoteValue: True patriotism hates injustice in its own land more than anywhere else

Quote.Author: Clarence Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: Good manners will open doors that the best education cannot

Quote.Author: Clayton Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: You may hate gravity, but gravity doesn't care

Quote.Author: Colin Kaepernick
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm going to continue to stand with the people that are being oppressed

Quote.Author: Colin Mochrie
Quote.QuoteValue: We all have a dinosaur deep within us just trying to get out

Quote.Author: Colonel Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of learned men think people really are the food they've eaten

Quote.Author: Conan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen

Quote.Author: Condoleezza Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: We need a common enemy to unite us

Quote.Author: Conor Oberst
Quote.QuoteValue: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend

Quote.Author: Conrad Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: You are always a student, never a master. You have to keep moving forward

Quote.Author: Coretta Scott King
Quote.QuoteValue: Hate is too great a burden to bear. It injures the hater more than it injures the hated

Quote.Author: Cory Booker
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't have a physical transformation until you have a spiritual transformation

Quote.Author: Cory Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: We can't disrespect people for having a different opinion

Quote.Author: Courteney Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to feel I'm responsible for anorexia across the country

Quote.Author: Courtney Love
Quote.QuoteValue: I want every girl in the world to pick up a guitar and start screaming

Quote.Author: Craig Ferguson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very interesting to know what people are doing while you're working on late-night television

Quote.Author: Craig Kilborn
Quote.QuoteValue: My brother asked me once, 'Are you a misanthrope?' And I said, 'No, I just find people irritating.'

Quote.Author: Craig Sager
Quote.QuoteValue: I will never give up, and I will never give in

Quote.Author: Craig Venter
Quote.QuoteValue: A doctor can save maybe a few hundred lives in a lifetime. A researcher can save the whole world

Quote.Author: Cristiano Ronaldo
Quote.QuoteValue: Talent without working hard is nothing

Quote.Author: Curtis Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: My grandmother, she's been the positive portion of my life the entire time

Quote.Author: Cy Twombly
Quote.QuoteValue: Graffiti is usually a protest - ink on walls - or has a reason for being naughty or aggressive

Quote.Author: Cyndi Lauper
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything does go in a circle

Quote.Author: Cyril Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: Purity engenders Wisdom, Passion avarice, and Ignorance folly, infatuation and darkness

Quote.Author: C. L. R. James
Quote.QuoteValue: Technological discoveries are the spermatozoa of social change

Quote.Author: C. Northcote Parkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Work expands so as to fill the time available for its completion

Quote.Author: Calista Flockhart
Quote.QuoteValue: I do wish my breasts were bigger. Not big... but less small

Quote.Author: Calvin Trillin
Quote.QuoteValue: As far as I'm concerned, 'whom' is a word that was invented to make everyone sound like a butler

Quote.Author: Cameron Dallas
Quote.QuoteValue: I started breaking out of my shell in sophomore and junior year

Quote.Author: Cameron Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a pretty girl who's a model who doesn't suck as an actress

Quote.Author: Cameron Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: Image is powerful, but image is also superficial

Quote.Author: Camila Alves
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the only time that I worry about looking good is on the red carpet

Quote.Author: Camille Claudel
Quote.QuoteValue: You see that it is not at all like Rodin... I share these only with you, don't show them

Quote.Author: Campbell Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: What is happening with automation and globalization, that's not going away

Quote.Author: Campbell Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Working hard is great, being lazy sometimes is great, but failed potential is the worst

Quote.Author: Candace Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: Women with money and women in power are two uncomfortable ideas in our society

Quote.Author: Candice Olson
Quote.QuoteValue: The perfect antidote to dark, cold and creepy is light, warm and cozy

Quote.Author: Canelo Alvarez
Quote.QuoteValue: I just love what I do. I'm not worried about any burnout

Quote.Author: Carl Hiaasen
Quote.QuoteValue: My escape is to just get in a boat and disappear on the water

Quote.Author: Carla Gugino
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite thing is to have a big dinner with friends and talk about life

Quote.Author: Carli Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I've kept to myself, I've put my head down. I've gone to work. And I have felt undervalued

Quote.Author: Carlos Fuentes
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a literary animal. For me, everything ends in literature

Quote.Author: Carly Rae Jepsen
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to mix and match vintage with designer. It's how I create my own style
